name: Small Health Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health on use.

name: Iron Ore
description: A chunk of iron ore used in basic crafting recipes.

name: Copper Ore
description: Soft copper ore suitable for starter smithing recipes.

name: Ash Log
description: A light log harvested from ash trees for basic woodworking.

name: River Fish
description: A common fish caught in calmer waterways.

name: Silverleaf
description: A fragrant herb used in mid-tier tonics.

name: Storm Shard
description: A crackling mineral fragment from unstable storm veins.

name: Verdant Bloom
description: A rare herb prized by Verdant Reach alchemists.
